customContent.homeScreenMsgBody:
Empara is your one app for clear benefit and cost information, intuitive ID cards by coverage type, and seamless access to virtual care and navigation.

Message your care team on your schedule - no appointment necessary. Ask about benefit questions, procedure pricing, how to lower your prescription costs, help with a high-cost bill and more…

Notice:
Cary this card at all times. Before hospital admission or surgery (outside the physician's office) or for other services as specificed in your plan your physician must call for pretreatment authorization precertification. Failure to comply may result in reduction of benefits. Emergency hospital admissions must be reported within 48 hours or by the next regular working day following admission (72 hours in some states). For more information visit members.contosotpa.com.

Possession of this card or obtaining precertification does not guarantee coverage or payment for the service or procedure reviewed. Please call the number on this card to verify eligibility. 

To find a Cigna provider, please visit www.mycigna.com

Benefits are not insured by Cigna or affiliates.
contacts.name: Deductibles, Out-of-Pocket Max and Critical Notices
